Portal 1, is an alright game, you go through various test chambers to test yourself with a portal gun. It starts off pretty easy, but eventually gets harder. There is quite a lack of content though and due to that the game is pretty short and can be finished in an hour or two.

10/10 this puzlle plataformer it's just good you got puzlles plataforming and even some parkour and even a boss fight everyone should have this game and the history man and dind't even play bonus that the game offers and the game have a save file for every single stage so you can go back at any part at any moment this game it agged very well

I don't think I could say anything about this game that hasn't already been said. Its an incredible game, one of the best of all time. It totally deserves a place in the gaming hall of fame. The mechanics are solid, the puzzles are good, its lots of fun, the story telling and atmosphere is good too. Its an old game and shows signs of wear but it still looks ok after all these years. Portal 2 is even better. If you haven't played this then you're missing out.
me marco... el ano y el corazon

at first this game might look super dated, but once you go into the gameplay its really fun and doesnt feel unfair and most times i messed up felt like it was my fault. Its a short but sweet game and seems fun to speedrun.

解谜并不难，客观来讲，Portal解谜的难点更多是想不到要这么做，而不是不知道怎么做，关注地图元素的设置用意，就很容易找到解决问题的办法，甚至有很多不严谨的解决办法。不过玩到后期真的很担心突然蹦出来一只猎头蟹

Не такая сложная и длинная, как вторая часть. Но менее интересным от этого сюжет не становится, ровно так же, как и интерес решать головоломки. Как минимум для предыстории второй части очень рекомендую пройти. Как бонус впечатлили комментарии разработчиков к уровням: можно понаблюдать за их мышлением во время создания игры.

this game is a masterpiece!

even if this game is very short (2 hours for me) it made me amazed with how good the game and story was, the first 19 levels are pretty decent, for me it wasnt a challenge until like level 10, but after those levels HOLY SHIT the game gets amazing, the environmental storytelling was fucking insane as well and made me spend a couple minutes looking around to just find out what had happened.

the puzzles are fun and not super hard, i reaally like the portal mechanic

this is one of my favourite games ever and it is 2 hours long, BUY IT
Esta bueno, aunque se llegue a sentir algo monotono, pero aun asi lo disfrute

Un juego increíble, te hace pensar mucho y la historia y el humor le da un encanto maravilloso.
Totalmente recomendado.
